summary: Frontend developer with experience in React and ES6+. Proficient in HTML5/CSS3, Redux, Bootstrap, Material UI, and modern tooling (webpack, Babel, NPM). Familiar with Java, C#, and C/C++. Experienced in Agile environments, code reviews, and collaborative tools (GitHub, Trello, Slack, MS Teams). Proficient with design tools such as Figma and Adobe Photoshop; comfortable with UX-focused UI development.

experience.title: Customer Care Associate
experience.description: Customer care for Dell in CIS; support Dell customers and service providers in the CIS region.

experience.title: Frontend React developer
experience.description: Developed a single-page web application for ticket service: administrator/moderator control panel; user interface for booking and purchasing tickets through PayPal. Responsibilities included developing responsive UI, maintaining code, code reviews, adding features, fixing problems, and code deployment. Technologies used: ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, LESS, React, React Router, React DayPicker, Redux, Bootstrap, Material UI, MomentJS, JSON, NPM, Jest, ESLint, AJAX, webpack, Babel; Git, Scrum, pair-programming, Trello.

experience.title: User Support and Information Security IT Specialist
experience.description: Developing and supporting corporate website on SharePoint; user support; physical infrastructure monitoring; IT security issues monitoring.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: Projects include an enterprise management system and road display system. Responsibilities: building and maintaining code, code reviews, adding and testing features, fixing problems. Technologies: Node.js, Asp.net, ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JSON, NPM, ESLint, AJAX, webpack, Babel. Tools: git, GitHub, Discord, VSTS.
